allow: Bash(git commit -m "feat: Add custom Claude Code commands (dailyreview, todo, portfolio)")
Bash(git commit -m "feat: Add basic authentication module")

Bash(git commit -m "docs: Add README, examples, and install script

- Add comprehensive README.md with usage guide
- Add example outputs for dailyreview and todo commands  
- Add install.sh script for easy installation
- Add .gitignore for common files")

Bash(git commit -m "feat: Add v2 optimized commands and GitHub distribution setup

- Add v2 commands (dailyreviewv2, todov2) - 80% shorter, 85% faster
- Update README with one-click installation
- Add MIT License
- Add comprehensive v2 documentation (changelog, test guide, examples)
- Replace placeholders with github.com/wineny/claude-daily-commands
- Optimize install.sh for v2 support")

Bash(git commit -m "fix: Support one-click curl installation

- Auto-detect installation method (remote curl vs local git clone)
- Download files from GitHub when using curl method
- Copy files from local directory when using git clone
- Simplify installation options (remove local option for curl method)
- Fix error when .claude/commands directory doesn''t exist")

Bash(git commit -m "fix: Handle stdin in curl pipe installation

- Detect interactive vs non-interactive mode
- Auto-install (global + v2) when piped from curl
- Use /dev/tty for interactive prompts in git clone mode
- Add better visual feedback with progress indicators
- Improve error handling for failed downloads")
